ModMetaData.name: Eck's - Plague Gun
ModMetaData.author: Eck
ModMetaData.description: V1.1 This mod adds a plague gun, a weapon that has a chance to give your enemies the plague. Special thanks to Jecrell for making this tutorial! I worked through the issues and have updated it to RimWorld version 1.4. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=33219.0
